description:
Michiko visits her old friend Ivan to ask the whereabouts of a man named Satoshi, who might know where Hiroshi is. Thinking the task ahead to be dangerous, Michiko leaves Hatchin with Zélia Bastos at the orphanage where she grew up, for her safety.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La saudade degli stolti - Parte I
愚か者たちのサウダージ PARTE1
